If, like me, you've seen Akira lots of times with the original English dub then, yes, it does seem a little odd to hear it with the newer dub, but I can't see why people put it down.
Both dubs have their flaws and levels of 'cheesiness', but hearing a new version gives the movie a facelift.
For the file size, the video quality is excellent.
